title: [Large-Scale] Online Teacher Training: Web-Based Instructional Design for Supporting English Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Education Experience and Basic English Pedagogy Knowledge
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for supporting English language learners (ELLs) in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Real-time feedback via formative assessment and emphasis on job relevance

learning_goals: Participants can apply at least three strategies for analyzing English language learners' (ELLs) linguistic and academic needs
Participants can design ELL-tailored instructional materials using web-based tools and achieve over 80% suitability evaluation criteria
Participants can identify five core challenges needed to solve real-world educational problems through Q-methodology-based case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
